dataset_id: IMS-1 HYSI TOA Radiance and Reflectance Product
title: IMS-1 HYSI TOA Radiance and Reflectance Product
summary: The data received from IMS1, HySI which operates in 64 spectral bands in VNIR bands(400-900nm) with 500 meter spatial resolution and swath of 128 kms.
